At parties don\'t mind\nsinging along to the song\nof Morgenstern - ПОСОСИ
Save
Impostor?
Something tells me that you are not Bogdan -_-. Don\'t try to fool me!
Run!
Warning
On this difficulty, you will receive less extra time after each cycle! If you win this difficulty, I will add your name to the bible as a saint
Mmmm, okay
Stop the Game
Press the buttons in the correct\norder and get %d scores to win
%d scores
Have you won?
You won, of course, but instead of playing you\'d better go Alcoholics Anonymous and get some medical treatment
This is a victory, but if you are a pregnant guy, I advise you to see a doctor in Novinki.
It\'s good that my game is just button presses. If the game had a button to start a holocaust, would you press it, Nazi?
Where did you get the strength to play this game and win, old man. I thought you only know how to fly on a helicopter with Kalash
HOW DID YOU DO THAT?? YOU HAVE A PAWS !!
It is sad that this game has not yet been equated with a sports discipline. Otherwise, for pills, I would give bans by IP -_-
It seems to me that you are not Bogdan -_-, he would never have scored so many scores, run the impostor!
Not today, bro:)
You have lost, but that doesn\'t mean that you need to take up the bottle right away. And most importantly, don\'t sit on it !!
I don\'t know what could be worse, losing a child\'s game or getting pregnant at 16. What do you think?
Lost 1945 and lost in a child\'s play, Nazi)
I made this game sitting in white-red-white socks, old man, so you can\'t win!
Don\'t be upset, Kitty, sooner or later humanity will self-destruct and you will be the winner in the survival game, but not today)
Hope you\'re on diarrhea pills now because you fucked up
Okay, let\'s believe that you are Bogdan, he would never have won this game
Cancel
Achievements %1$d/%2$d
Holocaust? No, I have not heard

Pregnant at 16
Win on high difficulty and become an iamthemother
Drink only vodka
Win on high difficulty while drunk
Enemy of the people
Win on high difficulty as Dictator
I have paws
Win on high difficulty by being soft and fluffy
Didn\'t pass a doping test
Win on high difficulty playing on pills in the mental hospital
Mom\'s friend\'s son
Become successful
I\'m just watching
Lose in disgrace
Truth can be cruel
Accept truth and it\'ll stay with you forever
Easy win
Win on easy difficulty as a weakling
Be cool
If you get all the achievements in this game, you can quit the company. Or is it just an attempt to make you play?
I can escape
You have a new achievement!
Difficulty: %1$s. I scored %2$d points in this damn game and became the hero of my nation. And in this stinking country, i showed the ridge and that\'s it, they put me on the bottle.
Difficulty: %1$s. I have %2$d points in this game and in my opinion everyone should envy my speed! Especially my partner, who did not have enough speed to stick out in time.
Difficulty: %1$s. I have %2$d points and I have no idea what that means, because in sorrow and in joy I drink. Let\'s go for a drink, huh?
Difficulty: %1$s. I got %2$d points and I can say one thing! There are no viruses in this game, you haven\'t noticed that they fly, do you? Nope, and I don\'t see either.
Difficulty: %1$s. I scored %2$d points, which is more than the average human can score. And I don\'t even have fingers!

Difficulty: %1$s. I scored %2$d points and you know, I am so filled in my knowledge, as if I have lived for 100 trillion billion years on trillions and trillions of the same planets. Well, either it\'s about the pills I\'m taking.

Difficulty: %1$s. I scored %2$d points in my own game. And it doesn\'t matter, because the rules are written by me, but if the number of points in the previous sentence is prohibitive, then I am proud of myself!
Difficulty: %1$s. I got %2$d points in this damn game. Here I have caught so many insults that now I need the help of a psychologist, thank you!
